          <title>
            <string language="sl">Poišči lomni  količnik leče</string>
            <string language="en">Find index of refraction of a lens</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Entdeckungbrechungskoeffizient eines Objektivs</string>

          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Odvisnost loma svetlobe skozi lečo, če je potopljena v različne snovi.</string>
            <string language="en">Relation between refractive index of the lens and the medium in which the lens is placed.</string>
          </description>

            <string language="sl">fizlet</string>
            <string language="en">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">lomni količnik</string>

          </keyword>

          <keyword>

          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Relation entre l'indice de réfraction de 
l'objectif et le support dans lesquels l'objectif est placé.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Relação entre o deslocamento predeterminado

          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Rapporto fra l'indice di rifrazione

          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σχέση μεταξύ του διαθλαστικού ευρετηρίου του φακού 
και του μέσου στα οποία ο φακός τοποθετείται.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Relación entre el índice de refracción de la
